document.full_text: one in three of all types of amphibians may yet to be found by scientists and remote tropical forests should get extra protection as the likely homes of such "unknown" creatures, a study said on wednesday.
document.title: third of amphibians said unknown; lurk in forests
lines_and_colors: one in three of all types of amphibians may yet to be found by scientists and remote tropical forests should get extra protection as the likely homes of such "unknown" creatures, a study said on wednesday.
